    The leader of the European Union criticized the free supply of Russian grains to Africa.

    The leader of the European Union, Charles Michel, recently expressed his disapproval of the plans of Russia, Turkey and Qatar to supply Russian grain free of charge to the countries of Africa that needed it. According to Michel, these are...
